project_task_id.description: The project tasks ID as described in the `task_meta_id` field

task_meta_id.description: The ID of the project task (named for backwards compatibility)

project_id.description: The ID of the project the project task belongs to

phase_id.description: The ID of the phase the project task belongs to; `0` indicates it does not belong to a phase

task_name.description: The name of the project task, an empty string is valid and is the default on the UI when a project task has not been chosen

billable.description: `1` = Billable, `0` = Non-billable - Billable project tasks may not belong to non-billable projects or phases

budget.description: The budget amount for 'hours by task' or 'fee by task' project budgets

count_tasks.description: The number of allocations (`task_id`) this project task is associated with.

count_logged_time.description: The number of logged time entries (`logged_time_id`) this project task is associated with.

modified.description: Date this record was last modified
